item.title: 墨西哥通胀率升幅超预期，墨西哥银行放缓减息步伐
item.description: 在墨西哥央行放缓降息步伐之后，墨西哥上个月的年度通胀加速度超过了预期。【原文：Mexico’s annual inflation accelerated more than expected last month after the central bank slowed the pace of interest rate cuts.】

item.title: 国王街校友耗资 10 亿美元的新公司将成为本年度最大的公司之一
item.description: 前国王街资本管理公司（King Street Capital Management）合伙人保罗-戈德施密德（Paul Goldschmid）准备以超过 10 亿美元的资金推出他的信贷对冲基金，这将成为本年度最大的首次亮相基金之一。【原文：Former King Street Capital Management partner Paul Goldschmid is poised to launch his credit-focused hedge fund with more than $1 billion, making it one of the year’s biggest debuts.】

item.title: 阿拉比卡咖啡溢价因供应担忧跃升至 2011 年高点
item.description: 由于担心高端咖啡豆供应紧张，阿拉比卡咖啡相对于罗布斯塔咖啡的溢价上升到 2011 年的水平。【原文：Arabica’s premium over robusta coffee rose to levels last seen in 2011 on worries over tight supplies of the high-end beans.】

item.title: 匈牙利与壳牌签署 10 年期天然气协议，欧盟准备退出俄罗斯天然气供应
item.description: 匈牙利与壳牌石油公司（Shell Plc）达成了一项为期 10 年的天然气供应协议，这标志着匈牙利在欧盟逐步停止进口俄罗斯天然气的最后期限临近之际，为摆脱俄罗斯天然气供应而迈出的第一步。【原文：Hungary clinched a 10-year gas supply agreement with Shell Plc, marking one of its first steps to diversify away from Russian flows as a European Union deadline to phase out those imports nears.】

item.title: 贝雅收购加拿大萨加德公司股份，推动私人基金发展
item.description: Robert W. Baird & Co.正在收购加拿大另类资产管理公司 Sagard Holdings Inc.【原文：Robert W. Baird & Co. is buying a stake in Canadian alternative asset manager Sagard Holdings Inc., becoming its first US institutional shareholder in a deal that also includes distribution of Sagard funds.】

item.title: 在奥尔扎格的增收计划中，拉扎德将目光投向了中东地区
item.description: 作为首席执行官彼得-奥尔萨格（Peter Orszag）长达数年的公司收入翻番计划的一部分，拉扎德公司（Lazard Inc.【原文：Lazard Inc. is aiming to station half a dozen bankers in its newly-opened office in Abu Dhabi as part of Chief Executive Officer Peter Orszag’s yearslong plan to double the firm’s revenue.】

item.title: 花粉街资本向中东金融科技公司投资 1 亿美元
item.description: 随着中东地区对私人信贷需求的增加，Pollen Street Capital 向阿拉伯联合酋长国的中小型公司贷款机构 CredibleX 提供了 1 亿美元的贷款。【原文：Pollen Street Capital extended a $100 million lending facility to CredibleX, a United Arab Emirates-based lender to small-and-medium sized companies, as demand for private credit in the Middle East rises.】

item.description:
由于欧佩克（OPEC+）加息有可能进一步削弱价格，生产商正在削减人数。【原文：

item.title: 里夫斯称英国可能需要国际货币基金组织救助的说法 "并不严重
item.description: 英国财政大臣雷切尔-里夫斯（Rachel Reeves）对反对党保守党暗示英国可能需要向国际货币基金组织寻求救助的说法进行了回击，称这种说法 "不负责任"。【原文：Chancellor of the Exchequer Rachel Reeves hit back at the opposition Conservative Party for suggesting the UK may need to seek a bailout from the International Monetary Fund, calling the claim “irresponsible.”】

item.title: B.莱利在报告延迟后更换审计员
item.description: B.瑞利金融公司（B. Riley Financial Inc. 是一家努力提交逾期已久的财务报告的经纪公司）表示，它将在提交审计结果的最后期限前几周更换会计师事务所。【原文：B. Riley Financial Inc., the brokerage struggling to file its long-overdue financial reports, said it will change accounting firms just weeks before a deadline to produce audited results that B. Riley needs to preserve its stock listing.】

item.title: 法国葡萄酒生产受夏季热浪和野火影响
item.description: 由于热浪、干旱和野火破坏了葡萄园，法国预计 2025 年的葡萄酒产量将低于五年平均水平。【原文：France expects 2025 wine production to drop below the five-year average, after heat waves, drought and wildfires damaged vineyards.】

item.title: 汇丰银行传统债券投资者持有高息债券
item.description: 汇丰控股公司四种高息老式债券的大多数投资者决定继续持有债券，而不是将其卖回给银行。【原文：Most investors in four high-coupon, old-school bonds by HSBC Holdings Plc decided to hold on to their notes instead of selling them back to the bank.】

item.title: 肯尼亚财政部计划在三月份之前将 10 亿美元债务转换为预算资金
item.description: 据肯尼亚国家财政部称，肯尼亚计划在 3 月前与世界粮食计划署签署一项 10 亿美元的债换粮协议，作为加强国家财政战略的一部分。【原文：Kenya plans to issue a $1 billion debt-for-food swap with the World Food Programme by March as part of a strategy to bolster the nation’s finances, according to the National Treasury.】

item.title: 亚洲仓库提货量激增，铝保持涨势
item.description: 由于从伦敦金属交易所亚洲仓库提货的请求连续第二天激增，铝保持了近期的涨势。【原文：Aluminum held recent gains as requests to make withdrawals from London Metal Exchange warehouses in Asia surged for a second day.】

item.title: 越南通过五年试验计划测试加密货币交易市场
item.description: 越南政府已批准开展为期五年的加密资产交易试点，此举旨在利用这个尽管缺乏法律框架但却在该国蓬勃发展的市场。【原文：Vietnam’s government has given the go-ahead for the five-year pilot of crypto asset trading, a move aimed at capitalizing on a market that has thrived in the country despite the absence of a legal framework.】

item.title: 纳斯达克同意向双子座加密货币交易所投资 5000 万美元
item.description: 在加密货币交易所准备首次公开募股之际，温克艾沃斯双胞胎的双子座空间站公司（Gemini Space Station Inc.【原文：The Winklevoss twins’ Gemini Space Station Inc. has secured an investment of as much as $50 million from Nasdaq Inc. in a private placement as the crypto exchange prepares for an initial public offering.】

item.title: 新北极船服务迎合不断增长的中欧贸易
item.description: 本月晚些时候，一艘名为 "伊斯坦布尔大桥 "的不起眼的集装箱船将满载货物驶离中国，前往英国和其他北欧目的地。这是世界上最繁忙港口之间贸易往来的例行公事。【原文：Later this month, a nondescript container ship dubbed the Istanbul Bridge is scheduled to depart China loaded with goods bound for the UK and other northern European destinations. It’s a routine example of trade flowing between the some of the world’s busiest ports.】

item.title: 支持中央银行关注通货膨胀的独裁者
item.description: 我是克里斯-安斯蒂，波士顿的经济编辑。今天我们来看看弗拉基米尔-普京对待中央银行的态度与唐纳德-特朗普有何不同。请将反馈和建议发送至 ecodaily@bloomberg.net。如果您还没有注册，请点击这里。【原文：I’m Chris Anstey, an economics editor in Boston. item.title: 摩根士丹利的 "翻转 "显示了米莱危机的蔓延速度
item.description: 不到一周的时间，自由市场改革者哈维尔-米莱伊（Javier Milei）以压倒性优势落败，摩根士丹利（Morgan Stanley）放弃了对阿根廷的看好。【原文：It took less than a week — and a landslide defeat for free-market reformer Javier Milei — to make Morgan Stanley abandon its bullish call on Argentina.】

item.title: 英国近三年来首次出现小船登陆海滩的情况
item.description: 本周末，英国出现了近三年来首次无人护送的移民船抢滩登陆，这引发了人们对首相基尔-斯塔默（Keir Starmer）为减缓英吉利海峡渡船数量创纪录地激增而开展的活动的新质疑。【原文：The UK saw its first beach landing of an unescorted migrant boat in almost three years this weekend, raising fresh questions about Prime Minister Keir Starmer’s campaign to slow a record surge in English Channel crossings.】

item.description: 标准银行集团有限公司（Standard Bank Group Ltd.标准银行集团有限公司首席执行官西姆-查巴拉拉（Sim Tshabalala）说，非洲大陆最大的贷款机构在东非资助的石油管道所带来的好处超过了环境风险。【原文：Standard Bank Group Ltd. item.title: 警方调查是监管机构否决巴西银行交易的最后一击
item.description: 在监管机构考虑批准巴西利亚银行收购 Banco Master SA 时，救市指控、劣质资产和一位正在休假的不称职首席执行官已经成为他们的心头大患。随后又出现了另一个红旗：目标公司与陷入大规模洗钱调查的公司有关联，该调查震撼了巴西金融业。【原文：Bailout accusations, poor quality assets and an under-fire CEO who jetted off on vacation were already weighing on regulators’ minds as they mulled approving Banco de Brasilia SA’s purchase of Banco Master SA. Then came another red flag: the target’s ties to firms caught up in a massive money-laundering probe that’s shaken the Brazilian financial industry.】

item.title: 销售前景改善，美国小型企业乐观情绪走高
item.description: 8 月份，美国小型企业的信心指数有所上升，销售预期为六个月来最乐观，企业主对公司的健康状况更加乐观。【原文：Sentiment among US small businesses edged higher in August, led by the most favorable sales expectations in six months as owners grew more sanguine about the health of their companies.】

item.title: 国债下跌；反弹暂停，焦点转向通胀数据
item.description: 本周的通胀数据可能会显示，持续的物价压力可能会阻碍美国降息。【原文：Treasuries slipped, snapping a four-day winning streak as investors braced for inflation readings this week which may show that ongoing price pressures could stand in the way of US interest rate cuts.】

item.title: 南非经济以两年来最快速度增长
item.description: 受制造业和采矿业强劲反弹的提振，南非经济在第二季度以两年来最快的速度增长。【原文：South Africa’s economy expanded at the fastest pace in two years in the second quarter, lifted by a strong rebound in manufacturing and mining.】

item.title: 加拿大皇家银行称股市反弹面临 "买家疲劳 "风险
item.description: 随着投资者从强劲的看涨定位中撤退，美国股市最近创下的纪录似乎岌岌可危。【原文：The recent record run by the US stock market appears to be in jeopardy as investors retreat from their strong bullish positioning.】
